Posts.Content: After her mastectomy she started getting backpain which was in her mid spine area. Anyway I suppose she suffered for about a month when she had a scan, the scan showed some seconderies in her spine. The pain is very often caused by the drugs and recovery pain from the ops so I think her docs were not too concerned at the time, but unfortunately her pain was due to the bone pain. I think there is info on this site about back pain which is really useful x
Posts.Title: Worried about back ache

Posts.Content: Hi there, just wondering how you are getting on.......
Posts.Title: Worried about back ache

Posts.Content: Hi there, Any new pain you experience should be checked out. My Mum had a similar pain and it was related to her breast cancer. Go and have a check up and keep in touch and let me know how you get on. Take Care x
